title: Saladin
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 1,979 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1110L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     T and X
description: Saladin (or Salah al-Din) was a famous Muslim leader during the Crusades, who united the Muslim people and retook Jerusalem from the Christians. Readers will be fascinated by this exciting biography.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
